mapper.sql: role_id, role_code, role_name, role_desc, create_user_id, create_time, modified_user_id, modified_time, status, is_delete
mapper.select: SELECT r.role_id AS roleId FROM `sys_role` r INNER JOIN `sys_user_role` ur ON r.`role_id`=ur.`role_id` AND ur.`user_id`=#{userId}

SELECT sr.role_id, sr.role_code, sr.role_name, sr.role_desc, sr.create_user_id, sr.create_time, sr.modified_user_id, sr.modified_time, sr.STATUS, sr.is_delete, sm.menu_id FROM sys_menuinfo sm left join sys_auth_role sar on sar.menu_id = sm.menu_id and sar.role_id = #{roleId} left join sys_role sr on sr.role_id = sar.role_id

select sr.role_id, sr.role_code, sr.role_name, sr.role_desc, sr.create_user_id, sr.create_time, sr.modified_user_id, sr.modified_time, sr.status, sr.is_delete, sar.menu_id as menuId from sys_role sr inner join sys_auth_role sar on sar.role_id = sr.role_id where sr.role_id in ( select sur.role_id from sys_user su inner join sys_user_role sur on sur.user_id = su.user_id where su.user_id = #{userId} and su.is_delete = 1 ) and sr.is_delete = 1
